name: The Way Out (Dawn Games Studios)
description:
The Way Out

You've been trapped in an unfamiliar place not knowing why you're there or how did you get there, only a door can be seen but which door would you choose? Can you escape?

Controls

A S W D Keys - Controls the movement 

Space Key - Go  near to the red reactor and click space to attach it to yourself

ESC Key - There is no pause in this game but if you give up press ESC to surrender

Developer Message

Hope you like the game :) 

This is my first game to ever publish it's only a short game but I hope It can give you a good time or get you annoyed XD 

Note you may experience lag but I'm working on a way to make it smooth for everyone this is only a prototype so the released game will be released soon. Hope you still have fun thanks

If there are any errors, bugs, or some things I forgot just let me know in the comments thank you so much!!
